answers.answer: How soon after breakfast did you check your blood sugar?  Bread is a simple carb and spikes the blood sugar pretty quickly.  If your body is producing adequate insulin, it would bring the blood sugar down pretty quickly.You should wait 2 hrs after a meal to test blood sugar, so it's unlikely that you have diabetes.If in doubt, have your doctor do a Hemoglobin A1c test and/or a glucose tolerance test.

That is to high. Get glucose intolerance test done. U could be insulin resistance/ pre diabetic control why I still can. I'm 30 last yr found out I'm insulin resistance and have PCOS. My dad his dad and 4 siblings all have diabetes. Good luck to you!

question: MY AGE NOW 36. U CAN SEE I HAD THYROID SURGERY ,   FOR THAT I GREW FAT. BUT I CHECK  MY BLOOD SUGAR, BEFORE MY BREAKFAST RESULT IS 5.44mmol/L, 98mg/dl, I TOOK 4 SMALL HOME MADE BREAD AND VEGETABLES WITH SHRIMPS, AFTER BREAKFAST MY SUGAR LEVEL WAS 9.38mmol/L, 169mg/dl.Can u say, what is it?
title: IS IT DIABETES???
